categories.title: Fundamentals
categories.description: Master the basics every bartender needs

lessons.title: How to Use a Jigger
lessons.description: Learn proper measuring technique for consistent cocktails. A jigger is essential for precise pours and balanced drinks.

lessons.title: Free Pouring Technique
lessons.description: Master the art of free pouring without measuring tools. Learn the count method used by professional bartenders.

lessons.title: Ice Handling & Types
lessons.description: Understanding different ice types and when to use them. From cubes to crushed, ice affects dilution and presentation.

lessons.title: Essential Bar Glassware
lessons.description: Learn which glass to use for different cocktails. Proper glassware enhances both presentation and drinking experience.

lessons.title: When to Shake vs Stir
lessons.description: The golden rule: shake drinks with citrus or dairy, stir spirit-forward cocktails. Learn the science behind each method.

lessons.title: The Japanese Hard Shake
lessons.description: Master the iconic Japanese hard shake technique developed by Kazuo Ueda for optimal dilution and aeration.

lessons.title: Dry Shake for Egg Whites
lessons.description: Learn the two-step shake method for perfectly frothy egg white cocktails like Whiskey Sours and Pisco Sours.

lessons.title: Proper Stirring Technique
lessons.description: Achieve the perfect dilution and chill for Martinis, Manhattans, and other stirred cocktails without over-diluting.

categories.title: Garnishes
categories.description: Elevate your drinks with professional garnishes

lessons.title: Citrus Twists & Peels
lessons.description: Create beautiful lemon, lime, and orange twists. Learn different styles from simple twists to elaborate horse's necks.

lessons.title: Expressing Citrus Oils
lessons.description: The finishing touch that transforms cocktails. Learn to properly express oils over the drink surface for aroma and flavor.

lessons.title: Flaming a Citrus Peel
lessons.description: Add drama and caramelized citrus notes by flaming orange peels. A classic technique for Old Fashioneds and more.

lessons.title: Working with Herb Garnishes
lessons.description: From mint sprigs to rosemary smoke, learn to select, prepare, and present aromatic herb garnishes.

categories.title: Advanced Techniques
categories.description: Pro-level skills for the serious mixologist

lessons.title: Layering Drinks
lessons.description: Create stunning layered shots and cocktails using density differences. Master the pour-over-spoon technique.

lessons.title: Fat Washing Spirits
lessons.description: Infuse spirits with savory flavors from bacon to butter. Learn this modern technique used in craft cocktail bars.

lessons.title: Milk Clarified Cocktails
lessons.description: Use milk clarification to create crystal-clear versions of citrus cocktails with silky texture and shelf stability.

lessons.title: Smoking Cocktails
lessons.description: Add depth and drama with smoke. Learn different methods from smoking guns to wood planks and torched herbs.

lessons.title: 9 BAR TRICKS in 90 Seconds
lessons.description: Learn 9 impressive bar tricks in under 2 minutes. Perfect for entertaining guests and adding flair to your bartending skills.
